name: Daisy Chain Miniature Music Box Pendant (Sunshine Yellow)
description: This music box pendant and others are available in our shop's new home My Secret Music Box . Go ahead and visit my new shop, and take a 5% discount on anything you find while you are there with the discount code: MSMintro Yours, Ola This sunny floral pendant is also a miniature music box meant to be worn and enjoyed. It measures just 1-11/16 inches x 1-3/8 inches and 9/16 of an inch deep. Your pendant is fitted with a vintage Japanese white daisy cabochon and plays a clockwork song. It is suspended by a two silver-plated bails in the shapes of leaves and plays the song You Light Up My Life. The sweetest gift. It will arrive in an environmentally friendly gift box bound with ribbon.

name: SOLD - Garden Carnival Musical Pendant
description: A whole world of music box pendants is available right now in our new home www.mysecretmusicbox.com Please visit my new shop, and enjoy a 5% discount on anything you find while you are there. Discount code at checkout: MSMintro Yours, Ola Four little daises peek out nestled in a bouquet of flowers clustered together on a vibrant red background. This little garden is suspended by two copper plate bails on on a 24 inch red-copper necklace. On the reverse side of this pendant there is a tiny brass winding key that operates the miniature musical box hidden inside. When it is wound a tinkling melody plays, You Light Up My Life, making this pendant equal parts romance and whimsy.
